must_subscribe_intro: 🔔 Sorry, you must subscribe to the following channels:
bot_already_running: ⚠️ Bot is already running on this server.
check_plugin: Please make sure your plugin is enabled ✅
bot_now_active: ✅ Bot is now active on server {{serverName}}
failed_connect: ❌ Failed to connect to the server. Please check the server is online and the data is correct.
send_ip_prompt:
Now send the server IP or domain.
Example: play.example.com
send_port_prompt: IP saved. Now send the port number (e.g., 19132):
port_must_be_number: ❌ Port must be a number. Please enter a valid port.
max_servers_reached: ❌ You cannot add more than 3 servers.
server_added_by_other: ⚠️ This server is already added by another user. You cannot add it.
error_adding_server: ❌ An error occurred while adding the server. Please try again.
send_channel_with_at:
Send the channel username with @ (example: @Aternos_24)
Send /cancel to abort.
channel_format_invalid: Invalid format. Channel username must start with @
channel_added: ✅ Channel {{channel}} added. All users will be rechecked.
send_channel_to_delete:
Send the channel username to delete (with @)
Send /cancel to abort.
channel_removed: ✅ Channel {{channel}} removed. All users will be rechecked.
no_servers_registered: No servers are registered in the bot currently.
send_broadcast_message:
Send the message you want to broadcast to everyone.
Send /cancel to abort.
broadcast_choose_settings: Choose broadcast settings then press Send:
cannot_apply_to_main_dev: Cannot apply this action to the main developer.
send_protocol_number: Send the protocol number for it.
protocol_must_be_number: Protocol number must be a number.
send_protocol_to_delete:
Send the protocol number to delete.
Send /cancel to abort.
protocol_not_found: ❌ No version found with that protocol.
how_to_use_text:
📚 How to add a server:

1. Press ➕ Add server
2. Send server IP (example: play.example.com)
3. Send server port (example: 19132)
4. Ensure the plugin is enabled on your server

Notes:
- Server must be online when adding
- Max 3 servers per user

For support join: @Aternos_24
you_are_banned: ❌ You are banned from using this bot.
message_expired: This message has expired. Please try again from the main menu.
thanks_for_subscribing: 🎉 Thanks for subscribing! You can now use the bot. Press /start.
still_not_subscribed: ❌ You are still not subscribed to all channels.
subscribe_first: ❌ Please subscribe to the required channels first!
welcome_message:
• Welcome  to Player Bot 🔮
I keep your Minecraft server online 24/7 🛎

Choose from the menu:
max_servers_reached_alert: ❌ You cannot add more than 3 servers. Please delete a server first.
no_bedrock_servers: You don't have any Bedrock servers added.
cannot_reach_server: ❌ Cannot reach the server right now.
confirm_delete_server: Are you sure you want to delete this server?
bot_not_active: ❌ Bot is not active right now.
admin_panel_welcome: 👑 Welcome to the developer control panel.
no_required_channels: No required channels at the moment.
system_status_text:
🖥️ System status:

CPU: {{cpu}} %
RAM: {{used}} MB / {{total}} MB
Bot RAM: {{botRam}} MB
Uptime: {{uptimeMinutes}} minutes
